svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Total deaths by risk factor, World
Total annual number of deaths by risk factor, measured across all age groups and both sexes over time.
Source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (GBD)
